name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior .NET Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in leveraging **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET**, and **SQL Server** to build high-performance and secure applications. My technical expertise extends to web services and data integration utilizing **XML** and **T-SQL**, ensuring robust solutions that meet industry standards. I bring a proven ability to work with major platforms like **Salesforce**, **PeopleSoft**, **SAP**, **Oracle**, and **Siebel**, enhancing system interoperability and data alignment.

With a strong foundation in **JavaScript**, I have a track record of developing user-friendly interfaces, and my communication skills enable effective collaboration with cross-functional teams to solve complex technical problems. I have successfully led projects that leverage cloud solutions for scalability and deployment, driving operational efficiency and compliance with regulations. My capacity to guide teams and stakeholders through the development lifecycle is complemented by my passion for continuous improvement and innovation in tech.
